questions.question_text: Which of the following BEST facilitates recovery of data lost as a result of a cybersecurity incident?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Offsite data backups

questions.question_text: Which of the following is MOST important to the successful implementation of a new information security program?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Gaining commitment from senior management

questions.question_text: An information security team has confirmed that threat actors are taking advantage of a newly announced critical vulnerability within an application. Which of the following should be done FIRST?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
When a critical vulnerability is discovered that is being actively exploited by threat actors, the first and most important step is to invoke the organization's incident response plan. This plan provides a structured and well-defined process for responding to security incidents, ensuring that the appropriate actions are taken in a timely and coordinated manner.

Selected Answer: C
C. Invoke the incident response plan.
All others can be part of the incident response plan

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the MOST important consideration when evaluating the performance of existing security controls?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Selecting testing methods that match the purpose of the testing

choices.C: Selecting testing methods that match the purpose of the testing
choices.D: Obtaining senior management support to facilitate testing
choices.B: Establishing testing scenarios based on international standards
choices.A: Interviewing control owners to accurately collect metrics data

questions.question_text: Which of the following metrics BEST demonstrates the effectiveness of an organization's security awareness program?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Number of security incidents reported to the help desk

choices.B: Percentage of employees who regularly attend security training
choices.A: Percentage of employee computers and devices infected with malware
choices.C: Number of security incidents reported to the help desk
choices.D: Number of phishing emails viewed by end users
